overview: The architecture represents a hybrid cloud solution utilizing Azure Local, integrating on-premises resources with Azure services. It encompasses various components that facilitate both traditional and containerized applications, along with robust management and security features.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Central hosting environment for both traditional VMs and containerized applications.
security_considerations: Regular updates and patch management to mitigate vulnerabilities.
Implementation of network segmentation to limit exposure.
components.data_handling: Handles sensitive data, requires strict access controls.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest and in transit is encrypted.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Management interface for Azure resources, including Azure portal and CLI.
security_considerations: Access control policies to restrict management access.
Audit logging for all administrative actions.
components.data_handling: Manages configuration data and user credentials.

components.name: Arc VMs
components.description: Virtual machines managed through Azure Arc for hybrid management.
security_considerations: Ensure secure connectivity to Azure for management.
Regular monitoring for compliance with security policies.

components.name: Hyper-V
components.description: Virtualization platform for running traditional applications.
security_considerations: Isolate VMs to prevent lateral movement in case of compromise.
Regularly update Hyper-V to fix known vulnerabilities.
components.data_handling: Handles application data and VM configurations.
components.encryption_status: VMs can be encrypted using BitLocker.

components.name: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
components.description: Managed Kubernetes service for deploying containerized applications.
security_considerations: Implement network policies to control traffic between pods.
Regularly scan container images for vulnerabilities.
components.data_handling: Handles application data and container configurations.

components.name: Azure Virtual Desktop
components.description: Provides virtual desktop infrastructure for users.
security_considerations: Use of Conditional Access policies to enforce security requirements.
Regular monitoring of user sessions for anomalies.
components.data_handling: Handles user data and application access.
components.encryption_status: All data in transit is encrypted.

components.name: Storage Spaces Direct (S2D)
components.description: Storage solution for high availability and performance.
security_considerations: Implement access controls to restrict storage access.
Regularly back up storage configurations.
vulnerabilities: Data loss due to hardware failure

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Manages East/West traffic between local machines and external connections.
security_considerations: Implement access control lists (ACLs) to restrict traffic.
Regularly update firmware to patch vulnerabilities.
components.encryption_status: Traffic can be encrypted using VPN.

components.name: Corp Firewall
security_considerations: Regularly review firewall rules for compliance.
Implement intrusion detection and prevention systems.

components.name: Azure Backup
components.description: Service for backing up Azure resources and on-premises data.
security_considerations: Ensure backup data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
Regularly test backup and restore processes.
components.encryption_status: Data is encrypted at rest and in transit.
vulnerabilities: Backup data exposure if not secured properly

security_risks: Data leakage through misconfigured monitoring settings
